about_the_game:
Jacques Du Schnozzle is the worst person in the world. Thankfully though, he’s just been murdered.

In this live-action, interactive movie, you’ll join Alana, Tim, and Lorenzo as they embark on a journey to try and figure out who killed Jacques Du Schnozzle. With no witnesses, little evidence, and zero experience in the field of criminal investigation, can this intrepid threesome solve the case or will they fall to the forces of evil?

  • Starring Ashton Matthews (TripleJump), Ben Potter (also TripleJump), Peter Austin (again, TripleJump), and James Jenkins (Holbeach Primary School’s 1997 Production of Charles Dickens’ A Christmas Carol)

  • Jaw-dropping stunts and special effects like nothing you’ve ever seen before

  • Accompany Alana, Lorenzo, and Tim as they embark on a dark, mysterious, and potentially supernatural journey

  • Make choices that will alter the course of the story and unlock more than 10 different endings

All Alana ever wanted was to be a celebrity chef, but after booking diva movie star Jacques Du Schnozzle to appear on her cooking show, she begins having regrets. Whilst shooting the latest episode on a closed set, the lights suddenly go out, and when the power comes back, Alana, her producer Lorenzo, and Jacques’ assistant Tim find Jacques brutally murdered. Facing a PR disaster, the plucky trio decide to try and solve the crime themselves. After all, how hard can it be to catch a killer?

Throughout the game you will be faced with tricky choices. Some options will bring you closer to catching Jacques’ killer, some will spell the end for our band of courageous heroes, and others will take them on a journey they’ll never forget.

We here at Team TripleJump love video games, and one night whilst having a little too much to drink and playing through a few of Wales Interactive's Live Action masterpieces, we thought to ourselves: “Why don’t we make a video game? How hard can it be?” Well, turns out it's really quite hard, but we’ve done it regardless, and we hope you have as much fun playing our love letter to the FMV genre as we had creating it!

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Comic Violence or Gore, Foul Language, General Mature Content

name: The Unexpected (But Not Entirely Surprising) Demise of Jacques du Schnozzle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 32-bit
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11.0 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 32-bit
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11.0 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Jacques Du Schnozzle is the worst person in the world. Thankfully though, he’s just been murdered. Do you have what it takes to catch his killer, or will the forces of evil stop you in your tracks?
